triggers.text: Storm Shadow destroys Bryansk Chemical Plant
Black Sea Fleet degraded; naval denial

Syrskyi stated that Russian forces breached Ukrainian engineering barriers only in a few places near Pokrovsk, and that the situation remains under control. He confirmed contingency plans 'B' and 'C' for all scenarios.
triggers.why_it_matters: Demonstrates layered contingency planning and disciplined command structure under stress, reinforcing Ukraine’s defensive coherence and adaptability.
triggers.bf_note: + Bayesian Factor for control resilience and operational foresight.

triggers.text: Ukrainians: 'No electricity, no connection, no heat — but we have NO RUSSIANS!'
triggers.why_it_matters: Reflects extraordinary civilian morale. Signals that Russian strategic terror campaigns—energy blackouts, infrastructure strikes—continue to fail in breaking Ukrainian will to resist. Psychological resilience remains a decisive asymmetric advantage.
triggers.bf_note: ↑ BF for Ukrainian civil resilience and strategic endurance
